homePage.title: Welcome to Fit3D
homePage.subtitle: Your one stop wellness assessment
homePage.noInternetInstructions: Please connect to internet and restart app

diagnostics.title: Proscanner Diagnostics
diagnostics.subtitle: Click on "more info" for additional help instructions
diagnostics.subtitleManual: Stand on weight scale and press buttons to continue
diagnostics.hasInternetCheck: Pinging our servers to ensure device is connected
diagnostics.hasInternetHelp1: Ensure tablet/laptop is connected to wifi or ethernet
diagnostics.connectedToScannerFail: Failed to connect to ProScanner hardware
diagnostics.connectedToScannerHelp1: Verify tablet/laptop and scanner are powered on
diagnostics.connectedToScannerHelp2: Unplug usb from back of tower and replug in
diagnostics.connectedToSensorCheck: Verifying that sensor is powered and connected
diagnostics.connectedToSensorSuccess: Successfully verified sensors are powered and connected
diagnostics.connectedToSensorHelp1: Unplug and replug usb from back of tower
diagnostics.isHardwareReadyCheck: Turntable will reset if not already in correct position
diagnostics.hasButtonResponseCheck: Waiting to detect the buttons pressed
diagnostics.cameraCalibratedNoStart: Waiting to calibrate camera (may take up to 2 min)
diagnostics.cameraCalibratedCheck: Calibrating camera (may take up to 2 min.)
diagnostics.btnDesc: If there is no button response, use the "Help?" widget at bottom right of screen.
diagnostics.weightScaleQuestion: Did you stand on the weight scale?
diagnostics.weightScaleDesc: Please step on the weight scale:
diagnostics.weightScaleDesc2: If there is no weight response, unplug power for scanner and plug back in.

registration.title: Register Proscanner
registration.error404: Registration failed: Invalid Activation Code--please try again.
registration.error409: Registration failed: Scanner has already been registered.

formErrors.activationCodeLength: Activation code should be 10 characters in length
formErrors.systemIdType: System ID should be a number
formErrors.sliderSnType: Slider serial number should be a number
formErrors.turntableType: Turntable serial number should be a number

signIn.title: Sign In to Scan
signIn.pinReset: If you forgot your password, you can request a PIN code. Your PIN code is valid for one scan OR 24 hours.
signIn.pinConfirmationInstructions: Clicking on 'Requesting New PIN' will take you back to the request PIN page. You can only request <1>one</1> PIN code every 24 hours.

signInErrors.waiverRequired: Please read and accept the Liability Waiver to continue
signInErrors.error: Login failed: Invalid e-mail or password
signInErrors.pinRequestFail: Scan PIN code request failed. Please check if your e-mail is valid.

signUp.proscannerSubTitle: Our patented tech digitizes your body in 3D.
signUp.wellnessSubtitle: We help you understand how your body shape affects your wellness and long term health.
signUp.scanSubText: Obtain a full 3D Image of your body from a simple 40 second scan.
signUp.cloudReportingSubText: View your data on any device from anywhere, including single scan reports, side by side comparisons, and an aggressive feature list.
signUp.safetySubText: Tested to comply with internationally recognized standards for safety and emissions.
signUp.measurementsSubText: The most crucial measurements are accurately extracted automatically from your high-resolution 3D scan.
signUp.bodyShapeSubText: Obtain personal body shape ratings with an understanding of health based on where mass is within the body, which utilizes body shape indexes from leading universities.
signUp.bodyCompSubText: Track your overall fitness progression by comparing your personal scans over time.

ethnicity.title: Ethnicity
ethnicity.island: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander

signUpErrors.passwordChar: Password must be at least 8 characters
signUpErrors.terms: - Please accept the Terms Agreement to continue
signUpErrors.privacy: - Please accept Fit3D's privacy policy to continue
signUpErrors.waiver: - Please read and accept the Liability Waiver to continue
signUpErrors.error: No internet connection. Please reconnect your internet and try again.
signUpErrors.error422: E-mail is already in use. Please use another e-mail
signUpErrors.error429: Duplicate sign up attempt. Account already created, please try logging in.

overview.hairSubTitle: To ensure neck measurement is accurate
overview.clothesSubTitle: To ensure your measurements are accurate
overview.background2: Ensure no sunlight or reflective material in view of scanner

metrics.heightInstructions: If your height is unchanged, just click the Next button.
metrics.additionalMetricsInstructions: Track data from other assessment devices all in one place. Adding additional metrics is optional.
metrics.weightScale1: Avoid touching the handles for accurate weight calculation
metrics.weightScale2: Stand as still as possible until we capture your weight
metrics.weightScaleInstructions: If your weight is not being calculated after a few seconds, please step off then back on the weight scale. Remember to stand still as possible.
metrics.weightTimeoutInstructions: We have not detected your weight, please select an option to proceed. If you get this message after standing on the scale please input weight manually and contact support.
metrics.newWeightInstructions: This weight will override the weight calculated from the scanner and will be used when calculating your wellness metrics. If you want to keep your weight value, just click on the 'Next' button.
metrics.weightQuestionInstructions: If your weight is unchanged, just click on the 'Next' button.

metricsErrors.heightValue: Please enter a number up to one decimal point (valid examples: 65, 65.0, 65,0)
metricsErrors.weightValue: Please enter a number up to one decimal point (valid examples: 140, 140.0, 140,0)

balance.title: Check Your Balance
balance.instructions: You will be moving to the scan guidelines screen in

scanGuidelines.title: Let's Start Scanning
scanGuidelines.subtitle: Follow these guidelines for the optimal scan... before pressing the buttons :)
scanGuidelines.instructions1: 1. Lift handles until arms and legs are straight.
scanGuidelines.instructions3: 3. Keep head still with eyes forward.
scanGuidelines.instructions4: 4. Please press and hold buttons until scan is complete.

coachRequest.noCoachesTitle: No coaches available at your facility
coachRequest.unavailableDesc: Please ask your coach to signup with Fit3d so you can share your results with them.
coachRequest.title: Current Coaches
coachRequest.addCoachesDesc: Adding a coach gives them permission to view all of your scan images.
coachRequest.accessDesc: You have given these coaches access to your images in the past. To remove their access, please use the web platform.
coachRequest.error: Failed to give coaches access. Please contact support or try again.
coachRequest.successSubtitle: Your coaches that now have access:
coachRequest.fail: Failed to give coaches access. Please contact support or try again.

scanComplete.title: Scan Complete
scanComplete.subtitle: Your scan was captured <1>successfully</1>!
scanComplete.instructions: Your scan result summary will be emailed to you shortly. Login to the web platform to review your detailed results.
scanComplete.coachTimer: Requesting coaches will only be available for <1><0>{{timeLeft}}</0></1> seconds.
scanComplete.caption: Example image shown above.
scanComplete.ttWarning: Turntable will rotate when sign out button is clicked.

errors.registration: Error checking ProScanner registration status. Please verify device is connected to internet and restart the app. If the error persists, please have the ProScanner owner contact our support team using "Help?" widget at the bottom right of the screen or by email at support@fit3d.com to resolve.
errors.scanDesc: Clicking buttons will cause turntable to spin
errors.template: If this error occurs again, please have the ProScanner owner contact our support team using "Help?" widget at the bottom right of the screen.
errors.scanStartDetails: Scan failed to start. Please unplug and plug back USB, then click "Retry Scan."
errors.serviceDetails: Scan failed to start. Please restart your tablet and try again.
errors.turntableMsg: Error connecting to turntable, please power cycle the ProScanner.
errors.userDetails: Buttons were released before the scan was complete.
errors.title: An Error Has Occurred
